TEXT.English: Choose from a list of available Commanders
TEXT.French: Choose from a list of available Commanders
TEXT.German: Choose from a list of available Commanders
TEXT.Italian: Choose from a list of available Commanders
TEXT.Spanish: Choose from a list of available Commanders

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Assigns [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1[COLOR_REVERT] [NEWLINE](%s2, level %d3, Commanding: %d4/%d5) [NEWLINE]to be the Commander of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s6[COLOR_REVERT]
